messages.subject: cool book
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/29/02 10:10:15 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... I found a really COOL book at Sam s today..... 1000 Playthinks , it wasn t there the last
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/29/02 10:10:15 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
starsuncloud@... writes:


> Not one person in this house has ever had a problem when surrounded by cool
> stuff they hadn't found all on their own.
>

I found a really COOL book at Sam's today....."1000 Playthinks", it wasn't
there the last time i was there, and it's 20 bucks, but looks like tons of
fun. If my daughter doesn't thinks it's worthwhile, that's ok, more time for
me to play! LOL It has 1000 puzzles, paradoxes, illusions and games, byt Ivan
Moscovich.....just wanted to share....let me quote from the back cover:

"A compulsive, exuberant cornucopia of puzzles, (it's) like salted peanuts
for the brain. Here are mental games, visual challenges, logic posers,
riddles and illusions.......Comprised of both original puzzles and
mind-boggling adaptations of of classic games, this book, written by a man
"Wired Magazine" called a "living inspiration for the rest of us," celebrates
that unique place where pure play and problem solving coexist. Start solving.
And right away you'll feel smart, intuitive, curious, successful and at one
with the beauty of mathematics."

here is a listing at amazon.com, guess sam's $20 is a good deal!

http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/0761118268/qid=1022706949/sr=2-3/002-19

46009-1944849 <A HREF="http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/0761118268/qid=1022706949/sr=2-3/002-1946009-1944849">Amazon.com: buying info: 1000 Play Thinks: Puzzles, Paradoxes,
Illusions & Games</A>

I guess i just wasted a bunch of time typing, the amazon site let's you peek
inside and the covers LOL

braincandy for those who like that sort of thing :0)


Ang
SAHM to
Megan Elizabeth 8/8/92 8lbs 8oz
Ashlyn Olivia 7/25/99 9lbs 8oz
Christian James 6/09/01 9lbs 5oz
